column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Of all the ramen spots that I visit in Houston
column2: jinya is the one that I always return to. Of the ramens I've tried there: tonkatsu ( rich pork broth ramen)
column3: the cha cha cha( garlic lovers special)
column5: I've always had a great experience eating them. What really makes jinya a great place to continue to eat at though is actually their Brussel sprout tempura and takoyaki. Every time I go there
column6: I always order these two items and constantly crave them!!
